item.title: Mix rubbish from house clearance at the corner of Friendly St Mews, 15th November
item.description:
This tipping has been here for 6 weeks now , Local residence keep relocating waiting for it to be moved, as it has to be stepped over to dispose of legitimate bin disposals. Now it has been pushed to on to the kerb preventing safe passage of impaired users has they have to step into a busy road to pass bye it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Friendly Street, New Cross, Catford, London Borough of Lewisham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes a d cracked road surfaces, 15th November
item.description:
The road on the upper end of Burnell Avenue from the rounabout at number 78 to 108, is badly damaged with dangerous cracks and potholes that have been getting deeper over the past 6 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burnell Avenue, East Wickham, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves and glass near bus stop, 15th November
item.description:
The pavement near the bus stop opposite the co- op has leaves all along, also litter with glass in this area. Please could a sweeper go right along the foot path. Its slippery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Chislehurst, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, bottles & cans, 15th November
item.description:
Green Lane road has litter right along from the junction of Edgebury down to the co op. Cans, bottles and other waste every few feet on the grass and in the gulley. Please could this area be litter picked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 156, Green Lane, Chislehurst, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
